sourcesContent:
<ng-container *ngIf="shouldUseAdminLayout(); else frontOfficeLayout">
    <!-- Layout Admin -->
    <dashboard-layout>
      <router-outlet></router-outlet>
    </dashboard-layout>
  </ng-container>
  
  <ng-template #frontOfficeLayout>
    <!-- Layout Front-office -->
    <app-header></app-header>
    <router-outlet></router-outlet>
    <app-footer></app-footer>
  </ng-template>
